headline: Steel Dynamics Falls on Earnings Beat. It Still Offers Hope for the Sector in 2026.
summary: Steel Dynamics’  stock jumped—and then fell—after the company posted better-than-expected earnings, and its management offered some optimism for the sector in the new year.  A year ago, Steel Dynamics reported EPS of $1.36.  Steel prices always move steel company earnings.

headline: Steel Dynamics: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results exceeded Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of four analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.72 per share. The steel producer and metals recycler posted revenue of $4.41 billion in the period, which missed Street forecasts.

headline: Steel Dynamics shares rise as fourth quarter earnings beat expectations
summary: Investing.com -- Steel Dynamics, Inc. (NASDAQ:STLD) reported fourth-quarter earnings that exceeded analyst expectations, despite revenue falling short of estimates, sending shares up 2.6% following the announcement.

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Steel Dynamics (STLD) After A 51% One Year Jump?
summary: If you are wondering whether Steel Dynamics at around US$181.32 is still offering fair value or starting to look expensive, you are in the right place. The stock has recently recorded returns of 4.5% over 7 days, 3.3% over 30 days, 3.0% year to date, and 50.8% over the past year, with a very large 5 year return that signals material investor interest over time. These moves come alongside ongoing investor attention on US steel producers and their role in construction, manufacturing and...
